Tech N Byte is a IT and Web Services Provider form Bangladesh. It offers complete digital solution for everyone. It’s wide range of Web Services includes Shared Web Hosting services too. All of it’s hosting services are powered by SSD storage which is upto 20x faster than spinning disk drives to ensure a faster hosting experience. It’s rock solid network infrastructure will ensure that your website don’t go offline for a second. All the popular features like Free SSL Certificate, CloudFlare CDN, Attracta SEO Tool, Free Scheduled Back Up, Softaculous One Click App Installer, Free Migration, Instant Activation etc. are included as standard with all the shared web hosting plans. A bunch of passionate support staffs are ready to assist you 24x7x365 over chat, phone, support ticket & email. All the plans are under a 30 days money back guarantee which will enable you to ask for a refund if you’re not satisfied. Moreover, you’ll be able to enjoy a 50% discount by using promo code ‘LAUNCH50’ at checkout.
